Package Controller

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
Controller.AppointmentController
public class AppointmentController extends Object
The AppointmentController class is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and DisplayAppointmentDetailView, and the model classes - Admin and Appointment.

This class provides functionalities to manage appointments, including creating, rescheduling, canceling, and viewing appointments. It also includes helper methods to retrieve appointment details and available doctor schedules.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Create appointments for patients and doctors.
  • View and manage appointments for patients and doctors.
  • Reschedule or cancel appointments.
  • Fetch appointment details and available schedules for doctors.
Since:
2024-11-17
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments currently in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all Appointment objects.

    • generateAppointmentId

      public static String generateAppointmentId()
      Generates a unique appointment ID for a new appointment.
      Returns:
      A unique appointment ID as a string.

    • makeAppointment

      public static boolean makeAppointment(Patient patient, Doctor doctor, Schedule schedule, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Creates a new appointment for a patient and doctor within the given schedule and time slot. Validates the input data, checks for schedule conflicts, and persists the new appointment.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient associated with the appointment.
      doctor - The Doctor attending the appointment.
      schedule - The Schedule of the doctor.
      startTime - The start time of the appointment.
      endTime - The end time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully created, false otherwise.

    • viewPatientAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> viewPatientAppointments(Patient patient)
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient whose appointments are to be viewed.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects associated with the patient.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public static boolean rescheduleAppointment(Appointment appointment, Schedule newSchedule)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new time slot within the doctor's schedule.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The Appointment to be rescheduled.
      newSchedule - The new Schedule for the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully rescheduled, false otherwise.

    • cancelAppointment

      public static boolean cancelAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Cancels an existing appointment by updating its status to AppointmentStatus.CANCELLED.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The Appointment to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully canceled, false otherwise.

    • viewDoctorAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> viewDoctorAppointments(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor whose appointments are to be viewed.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects associated with the doctor.

    • acceptAppointment

      public static void acceptAppointment(Doctor doctor, Appointment appointment)
      Confirms an appointment for a doctor by updating its status to AppointmentStatus.CONFIRMED. Also updates the doctor's availability to account for the appointment time.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor confirming the appointment.
      appointment - The Appointment to be confirmed.

    • declineAppointment

      public static void declineAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Declines an appointment by updating its status to AppointmentStatus.CANCELLED.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The Appointment to be declined.

    • viewConfirmAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> viewConfirmAppointments(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves a list of confirmed appointments for a specific doctor.

      This method loads the appointments from the repository and filters them to include only those that are confirmed and associated with the given doctor.

      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor for whom to retrieve confirmed appointments.
      Returns:
      A list of confirmed appointments for the specified doctor.

    • viewCompleteAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> viewCompleteAppointments(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves the available time slots for a doctor based on their schedule and pending appointments.

      This method checks the doctor's schedule and filters out any time slots that overlap with pending appointments. It considers only pending appointments and dynamically calculates available slots for the doctor.

      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose available slots need to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of available time slots as Schedule objects.

    • viewCompleteAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> viewCompleteAppointments(Patient patient)
      Retrieves a list of completed appointments for a specific patient.

      This method loads the appointments from the repository and filters them to include only those that are completed and associated with the given patient.

      Parameters:
      patient - The patient for whom to retrieve completed appointments.
      Returns:
      A list of completed appointments for the specified patient.

    • getAvailableSlotsForDoctor

      public static List<Schedule> getAvailableSlotsForDoctor(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves a list of completed appointments for a specific patient.

      This method loads the appointments from the repository and filters them to include only those that are completed and associated with the given patient.

      Parameters:
      patient - The patient for whom to retrieve completed appointments.
      Returns:
      A list of completed appointments for the specified patient.

    • getAvailableSlotsForDoctorExcludingAppointment

      public static List<Schedule> getAvailableSlotsForDoctorExcludingAppointment(Doctor doctor, Appointment appointmentToAccept)
      Retrieves the available time slots for a specific doctor while excluding a specific appointment time.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor whose schedule is to be checked.
      appointmentToAccept - The Appointment to be excluded from the schedule check.
      Returns:
      A list of available Schedule slots.

    • getAppointmentDetails

      public static String getAppointmentDetails(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves the details of an appointment based on the provided appointment ID. This method reads the latest data from the repository and searches for the appointment in the APPOINTMENT_LIST map. If found, it formats and returns the details. If not found, it returns a "not found" message.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the details of the appointment, or a "not found" message if the appointment does not exist.

    • getAllAppointmentIds

      public static List<String> getAllAppointmentIds()
      Retrieves a list of all appointment IDs from the repository. This method ensures the latest data is loaded from the repository and returns all keys (appointment IDs) from the APPOINTMENT_LIST map.
      Returns:
      A list of appointment IDs currently available in the repository.
